wikitext.*:
The '''Days of Dearth''' was the period of famine in [[The Shire]] following the [[Long Winter]],<ref name="Hobbits">{{FR|Hobbits}}</ref> a bitterly cold winter (lasting from [[November]] {{TA|2758}} to March [[Third Age 2759|2759]])<ref name="Eorl">{{App|Eorl}}.</ref> in which many thousands of [[Hobbits]] died. The subsequent famine continued into the year {{TA|2760}}.
